attributes.action: Keep schools in England open during COVID-19 lockdown
attributes.additional_details: In order to protect the eduction and mental wellbeing of children across the country.
attributes.background: To keep schools across England open during any COVID-19 lockdown until the government deem it unsafe for children to attend.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558050
